extendedInfo.description: Completely different approach to spot the best apps in the market. Instead of browsing the endless lists of random apps (like all those 3,5-rated apps listed in "the best" category), specify your own search conditions. You can also try a set of interesting preset searches.This is the only app that let you filter apps and games in entire market by rating, category, rating count, downloads count and sort them in the way you like.For example by just one touch you can find apps and games that are very well rated, but known by too few people. And many more!Old app name: Best apps hunter betaIf you're interested in news or want to share this project, you can find it here: Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Delicious-Market/373442752696026Google+: https://plus.google.com/117675916392406959251/posts

reviews.title: Excellent alternative
reviews.comment: Finally a good alternative to default android market/google play/whatever search, that lets you find exactly what you\'re looking for without the need to dig through tons of stuff you don\'t like.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good concept, poor execution.
reviews.comment: The pages aren\'t working correctly (I see the same app from page 1 on page 3). I wish it listed more apps on 1 page. After an hour of searching, this app didn\'t help me find another app I wanted. The algorithm he uses isn\'t that great in finding a \"good app.\" It\'s better to search google for app recommendations. Too bad though, I really wish this app did what it tried to do.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Beta or not, this app is wonderful... I have over 300 apps on my sgs2 & love trying new ones but have always wanted a better way of finding hidden treasure, this app delivers. a great job indeed :)
